description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk.
We brown Tipperary Irish butter and add Vermont maple syrup to make this flavor – pairs well with our Vietnamese coffee!
A milk tea ice cream with housemade dark brown sugar sauce mixed in.
Our collab with Chez Moi Bakery – a sour+amarena cherry ice cream with chunks of Red Stag bourbon cake mixed in. Not for the kiddos!
Lime ice cream with lime cookie crunch.
Lavender ice cream with housemade magic shell swirled through.
Our vegan pea protein base with blood orange purée and vanilla bean paste – like a fancy Creamsicle!
Our coconut cream base with ube (purple yam)
